content:
Jo Peninsulas 5:25 PM
Hi Steffen,

Thanks for your response! Earth Day 2023 is focused on raising awareness about environmental issues and promoting sustainable practices. We are indeed looking for speakers, thought leaders, and collaborators who can contribute their expertise and insights to make this event a success.

If you're interested in being a speaker or discussing other ways you can be involved, I would be happy to schedule a call to explore potential collaboration opportunities.

Please use the following link to find a suitable time slot that works best for you: <https://bit.ly/Meet-With-ForTreesClub>

Looking forward to connecting with you!

Best regards,
Jo
